content.raw:
gdb trace:

```
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fff6a7fc700 (LWP 14108)]
0x00007ffff6e0d280 in gazebo::sensors::ContactSensor::GetCollisionCount() const
    () from /usr/lib/libgazebo_sensors.so.1
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff6e0d280 in gazebo::sensors::ContactSensor::GetCollisionCount() const () from /usr/lib/libgazebo_sensors.so.1
#1  0x00007fff681b077c in gazebo::MudPlugin::Init() ()
   from /usr/lib/gazebo-1.8/plugins/libMudPlugin.so
#2  0x00007ffff7118f56 in gazebo::physics::Model::LoadPlugin(boost::shared_ptr<sdf::Element>) () from /usr/lib/libgazebo_physics.so.1
#3  0x00007ffff71192d5 in gazebo::physics::Model::LoadPlugins() ()
   from /usr/lib/libgazebo_physics.so.1
#4  0x00007ffff7140e8c in gazebo::physics::World::LoadPlugins() ()
   from /usr/lib/libgazebo_physics.so.1
#5  0x00007ffff7147153 in gazebo::physics::World::Step() ()
   from /usr/lib/libgazebo_physics.so.1
#6  0x00007ffff71499a4 in gazebo::physics::World::RunLoop() ()
   from /usr/lib/libgazebo_physics.so.1
#7  0x00007ffff5d1dce9 in thread_proxy ()
   from /usr/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.46.1
#8  0x00007ffff6885e9a in start_thread ()
   from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0
#9  0x00007ffff50c6ccd in clone () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6
```

If I remove the *<plugin name="seat_mud" filename="libMudPlugin.so">* from the *drc_vehicle/model.sdf*, it starts just fine.

gdb trace:

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fff6a7fc700 (LWP 14108)]

    () from /usr/lib/libgazebo_sensors.so.1

#0  0x00007ffff6e0d280 in gazebo::sensors::ContactSensor::GetCollisionCount() const () from /usr/lib/libgazebo_sensors.so.1

   from /usr/lib/gazebo-1.8/plugins/libMudPlugin.so

If I remove the <plugin name="seat_mud" filename="libMudPlugin.so"> from the drc_vehicle/model.sdf, it starts just fine.
